values.value:
(e) I take responsibility for updating my program budget sheet in the Greenheart Exchange GEO system to reflect a realistic budget based on any changes that have occurred since I completed the budget sheet the first time. These changes may include changes to the program duration, the average number of work hours per week, the rate of pay, and/or the cost of housing or transportation. I confirm that I can manage my finances and that I understand the implications that program changes may have on my financial situation.

(f) I will comply with all government, work, and housing policies related to pandemic prevention. This may include washing my hands frequently, not leaving my housing and/or moving to isolated housing if I am sick or exposed to the virus, avoiding large group gatherings, observing social distancing, and using a face mask and gloves as preventative measures.

(g) I will bring a personal supply of face masks/coverings that I can use throughout my entire time in the United States. These may be washable cloth or disposable masks. If I bring disposable masks or masks that require filters, I will bring enough for the entire period of my program.

(h) I understand that my host organization may choose to dismiss me from my teaching if I do not follow the required safety instructions that are in place to avoid the spread of an epidemic or pandemic. If this were to happen, I understand that Greenheart Exchange will not find me an alternative placement and that Greenheart Exchange may shorten or terminate my visa sponsorship.

(i) I understand that cultural activities may be limited or restricted due to social distancing guidelines, limitations on group gatherings, and other precautions for reducing the risk of infection. I acknowledge that it is still my intention to maximize my exposure to U.S. culture throughout my program in whatever way I can safely do so and that I will report my cultural interactions to Greenheart Exchange in my monthly check-ins.
